message: Once we're back, I head directly upstairs, plop down in bed, and get online with my Coil.
I thought I'd try doing some research on Toue, but...
Nothing that comes up is any different than what I'd find on the net back home. Just whitewashed histories and articles singing his praises.
There are also restrictions preventing me from contacting anyone in the Old Residential District, either by mail or by phone.
I sigh and close my Coil.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess the event tomorrow is my only hope."
I hope everyone back home is okay...
Ren is curled up asleep at my feet. I watch him for a little while.
Fixing him here is gonna be hard. My best bet would be to get him home ASAP.
Hopefully, we can finish things here and head back before he gets any worse.
I lie down and close my eyes. Tomorrow is gonna be a long day.
